chat_model.apiAuthKey: API KEY corresponding to the environment variable
chat_model.label: Model name
chat_model.name: ID

admin.model_one_default_only: There can only be one default model, please set other models as non-default first.
admin.title: Admin

chat.clearChatConfirm: Do you want to clear the chat session?
chat.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
chat.contextLength: Context Length, default 10 (2 at the beginning of the conversation + 8 most recent)
chat.deleteChatSessionsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
chat.deleteMessageConfirm: Do you want to delete this message?
chat.exportImageConfirm: Do you want to save the chat session as an image?
chat.exportMD: Export chat session to markdown file
chat.exportMDConfirm: Do you want to save the chat session as a markdown file?
chat.model: Model (OpenAI GPT4 needs separate application, Claude key can use all Claude models)
chat.placeholder: What would you like to say... (Shift + Enter = newline)
chat.placeholderMobile: What would you like to say...
chat.snapshotSuccess: Snapshot successful, please view in a new tab
chat.turnOffContext: In this mode, messages sent will not include previous chat logs.
chat.turnOnContext: In this mode, messages sent will include previous chat logs.

chat_snapshot.deletePost: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation record?
chat_snapshot.title: Chat Records

common.help: The first one is the theme(prompt), and the context includes 10 messages.
common.wrong: Something seems to have gone wrong. Please try again later.

error.gpt-4_over_limit: GPT4 message sending limit exceeded, please contact the administrator to enable or increase quota.
error.invalidPassword: password is not valid, it should be length >=6 and include a number, a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, and a special character
error.rateLimit: The message sending limit has been reached, please contact the administrator.
error.syncChatSession: Sync Failed, Please Try Again Later
error.token_length_exceed_limit: Total message length exceeds limit, please reduce context quantity, message length or start a new conversation.
